title: Donate PASTA for public goods
body:
Proposed by [@monet-supply](https://twitter.com/MonetSupply)

### Background

The [PastaDAO multisig](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/#/safes/0xB449dfE00aACf406eb442B22745A25430490FE1b/balances) currently holds 1,509,746 PASTA tokens accumulated from the 1% foodbank fee on token transfers. 

### Proposal

In keeping with the light hearted ethos of the Pasta community, I propose donating a significant sum from the treasury to public goods to show thanks to the wider Ethereum ecosystem (eg. 10% of the treasury would be 150,975 tokens, currently tradable for up to ~12 ETH or 22,000 DAI based on [pool liquidity](https://info.uniswap.org/pair/0xE92346d9369Fe03b735Ed9bDeB6bdC2591b8227E)) . 

Gitcoin has established infrastructure for grant funding via their matching rounds, and would be an ideal target for this donation. However, PastaDAO will remain open to other organizations or donation opportunities. 

**This is a signaling vote to confirm community support or opposition to public goods donations. An additional vote will be required to confirm the exact details of the transfer including amount of tokens to donate and recipient organization/address.**

### Next Steps

If this proposal is approved by voters, the DAO will coordinate with Gitcoin and other ecosystem participants to determine the logistical process for making a donation. A further proposal will be made to confirm and ratify the exact donation amount and transfer details before it will be issued by the multisig.

### Poll Question

Should PastaDAO donate funds to public goods?
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
